description.zh-cn: 香港男演员、歌手，是首位获得威尼斯影展终身成就金狮奖的华人演员，也是首位集齐香港电影金像奖、台湾电影金马奖、中国电影金鸡奖最佳男主角的演员。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor and singer, he is the first Chinese actor to receive the Golden Lion for Lifetime Achievement at the Venice Film Festival, and the first to win Best Actor at the Hong Kong Film Awards, the Golden Horse Awards, and the Golden Rooster Awards.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员，梁朝伟的妻子及经纪人。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress, wife and manager of Tony Leung Chiu-wai.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、演员、喜剧演员，说服梁朝伟一同报考无线电视艺员训练班。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director, actor, and comedian who persuaded Tony Leung to enroll in the TVB artist training course with him.

description.zh-cn: 香港的免费无线电视台，梁朝伟于1982年毕业于其艺员训练班并成为旗下演员。
description.en: A free-to-air television broadcaster in Hong Kong. Tony Leung graduated from its artist training course in 1982 and became one of its actors.

description.zh-cn: 无线电视旗下的演员训练课程，梁朝伟于1981年报考，1982年毕业。
description.en: An actor training program under TVB, which Tony Leung enrolled in in 1981 and graduated from in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 1980年代香港无线电视五位当红男艺人的合称，成员包括刘德华、梁朝伟、黄日华、苗侨伟、汤镇业。
description.en: A collective name for five popular male artists from Hong Kong's TVB in the 1980s, including Andy Lau, Tony Leung, Felix Wong, Michael Miu, and Kent Tong.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员、歌手，“无线五虎将”之一，多次与梁朝伟合作。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor and singer, one of the 'Five Tiger Generals of TVB', who has collaborated with Tony Leung multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员，“无线五虎将”之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor, one of the 'Five Tiger Generals of TVB'.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员，“无线五虎将”之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor, one of the 'Five Tiger Generals of TVB'.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员，“无线五虎将”之一。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor, one of the 'Five Tiger Generals of TVB'.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，与梁朝伟长期合作，执导了《重庆森林》、《花样年华》、《一代宗师》等多部由梁朝伟主演的电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director known for his long-term collaboration with Tony Leung, directing him in numerous films such as 'Chungking Express', 'In the Mood for Love', and 'The Grandmaster'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，曾执导梁朝伟主演的电影《色，戒》，并在第80届威尼斯影展上为梁朝伟颁发终身成就金狮奖。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director who directed Tony Leung in 'Lust, Caution' and presented him with the Golden Lion for Lifetime Achievement at the 80th Venice International Film Festival.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员，曾与梁朝伟交往6年。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress who was in a relationship with Tony Leung for 6 years.

description.zh-cn: 香港女演员，曾于1986年与梁朝伟交往。
description.en: A Hong Kong actress who was in a relationship with Tony Leung in 1986.

description.zh-cn: 国际电影节，于2023年授予梁朝伟终身成就金狮奖。
description.en: An international film festival that awarded Tony Leung the Golden Lion for Lifetime Achievement in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 美国电影和电视制片厂，制作了《尚气与十环帮传奇》，梁朝伟在其中饰演反派角色徐文武。
description.en: An American film and television production studio that produced 'Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings', in which Tony Leung played the villain Xu Wenwu.

description.zh-cn: 1989年发生在中国北京的政治事件。2002年，梁朝伟因对该事件发表的言论而引发争议。
description.en: A political event that took place in Beijing, China in 1989. In 2002, Tony Leung sparked controversy with his comments regarding the incident.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一种经济抗争模式，指支持反修例运动的消费者光顾有同样政治立场的“黄店”。2020年，梁朝伟被指控加租逼走一家“黄店”。
description.en: A form of economic protest in Hong Kong where consumers who support the anti-extradition bill movement patronize 'yellow shops' with similar political stances. In 2020, Tony Leung was accused of forcing out a 'yellow shop' by raising the rent.

en: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology

description.zh-cn: 位于香港的一所公立研究型大学，于2024年11月授予梁朝伟荣誉博士学位。
description.en: A public research university in Hong Kong, which conferred an honorary doctorate upon Tony Leung in November 2024.

description.zh-cn: 梁朝伟曾就读的中学。
description.en: The secondary school that Tony Leung attended.

description.zh-cn: 由导演王家卫创立的电影制作公司，曾是梁朝伟的经纪公司。
description.en: A film production company founded by director Wong Kar-wai, which was formerly Tony Leung's management agency.

description.zh-cn: 香港歌手、演员，曾与梁朝伟在电影《春光乍泄》中合作。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actor who co-starred with Tony Leung in the film 'Happy Together'.

description.zh-cn: 香港男演员，曾与梁朝伟合作《辣手神探》等电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong actor who has collaborated with Tony Leung in films such as 'Hard Boiled'.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、演员，曾执导梁朝伟出演的《癫佬正传》和《人民英雄》等电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director and actor who directed Tony Leung in films such as 'The Lunatics' and 'People's Hero'.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演，曾执导梁朝伟出演的《辣手神探》、《喋血街头》和《赤壁》等电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director who directed Tony Leung in films such as 'Hard Boiled', 'Bullet in the Head', and 'Red Cliff'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾电影导演，曾执导梁朝伟出演的《悲情城市》和《海上花》。
description.en: A Taiwanese film director who directed Tony Leung in 'A City of Sadness' and 'Flowers of Shanghai'.

description.zh-cn: 香港电影导演、编剧，曾与梁朝伟合作《无间道系列》和《金手指》等电影。
description.en: A Hong Kong film director and screenwriter who collaborated with Tony Leung on films such as the 'Infernal Affairs' series and 'The Goldfinger'.

description.zh-cn: 梁朝伟与刘嘉玲于2008年7月21日在不丹举行婚礼。
description.en: Tony Leung and Carina Lau held their wedding in Bhutan on July 21, 2008.

description.zh-cn: 在无线电视期间曾与曾华倩交往6年，期间三离三合，最终在1988年彻底分手。
description.en: During his time at TVB, he dated Margie Tsang for 6 years, with three breakups and reconciliations, finally parting ways for good in 1988.

description.zh-cn: 在1986年拍摄《倚天屠龙记》时曾与黎美娴交往。
description.en: Dated Kitty Lai in 1986 during the filming of 'The Heaven Sword and Dragon Saber'.

description.zh-cn: 周星驰说服梁朝伟放弃电器推销员工作，一同报考无线电视艺员训练班。
description.en: Stephen Chow persuaded Tony Leung to quit his job as an appliance salesman and enroll in the TVB artist training course with him.

description.zh-cn: 两人是老友，一同报考艺员训练班。
description.en: They are old friends and enrolled in the artist training course together.
Enrolled in 1981 and graduated in 1982.

description.zh-cn: 梁朝伟是1980年代无线五虎将之一。
description.en: Tony Leung was one of the Five Tiger Generals of TVB in the 1980s.

description.zh-cn: 梁朝伟与王家卫是长期合作伙伴，自1990年代起合作了多部电影。
description.en: Tony Leung and Wong Kar-wai are long-term collaborators, having worked together on numerous films since the 1990s.

description.zh-cn: 梁朝伟与李安合作了电影《色，戒》。
description.en: Tony Leung collaborated with Ang Lee on the film 'Lust, Caution'.

description.zh-cn: 李安在第80届威尼斯影展上担任引言人，为梁朝伟颁发终身成就金狮奖。
description.en: Ang Lee served as the presenter at the 80th Venice Film Festival, awarding Tony Leung the Golden Lion for Lifetime Achievement.

description.zh-cn: 威尼斯影展授予梁朝伟终身成就金狮奖，使其成为首位获此殊荣的华人演员。
description.en: The Venice Film Festival awarded Tony Leung the Golden Lion for Lifetime Achievement, making him the first Chinese actor to receive this honor.

description.zh-cn: 漫威影业宣布梁朝伟将在《尚气与十环帮传奇》中饰演反派，这是他首次主演漫威电影宇宙作品，标志其进入好莱坞主流市场。
description.en: Marvel Studios announced that Tony Leung would play the villain in 'Shang-Chi and the Legend of the Ten Rings', marking his first role in the Marvel Cinematic Universe and his entry into the mainstream Hollywood market.

description.zh-cn: 2002年，梁朝伟在宣传电影《英雄》时，借古喻今谈及对六四事件的看法，称中国政府当时的行为是正确的，该言论引发巨大争议。
description.en: In 2002, while promoting the film 'Hero', Tony Leung controversially commented on the 1989 Tiananmen Square protests, stating that the Chinese government's actions at the time were correct, which sparked significant controversy.

description.zh-cn: 2020年，梁朝伟被指控将其拥有的一个铺位加租，导致一家被视为“黄店”（支持“黄色经济圈”）的食店“天园饺子”迁走。
description.en: In 2020, Tony Leung was accused of raising the rent on a property he owned, leading to the relocation of 'Tianyuan Jiaozi', a restaurant considered a 'yellow shop' (part of the 'Yellow economic circle').

description.zh-cn: 香港科技大学授予梁朝伟荣誉博士学位，以表彰其在电影艺术领域的杰出成就。
description.en: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology conferred an honorary doctorate upon Tony Leung in recognition of his outstanding achievements in the art of cinema.
